attributes.action: get rid of income support and increase benifits to cover c/t andh/r
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: force pll on all benifits to pay part of there own rent,and ct thus giving them responsibility

rejection.details:
The petition request is not clear. If you want to resubmit this petition, please do not abbreviate. 

There is also a similar petition on the site:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/nofreehousing/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
